links.*: The Lord of the Rings (1979 radio series)

wikitext.*:
'''John Estill Vickery''' ([[4 November|November 4]], [[1950]]) is an American actor. Starting on stage in Shakespeare and Broadway, he appeared on television in guest appearances on many shows. He is probably best known for playing [[wikipedia:Neroon|Neroon]] on [[wikipedia:Babylon 5|''Babylon 5]]''. 

==Roles==
* [[1979]]: [[The Lord of the Rings (1979 radio series)|NPR's ''The Lord of the Rings'']]: [[Legolas]], [[Gríma|Wormtongue]], [[Faramir]], [[The Mouth of Sauron]]
